title.rendered: This Week at Gottwals Books – June 19

content.rendered:
Job Opening!

Gottwals Books is looking for a full-time Facility Manager and 1-2 Store Associates. Please send resumes to service@gottwalsbooks.com.

Host Your Book Club @ Gottwals!

We’ve heard of several book clubs in the Macon area. We invite you to hold one of your gatherings at our new store on Riverside. Contact us at service@gottwalsbooks.com to discuss scheduling.

Kid’s Corner at Gottwals Books

Gottwals Books presents Kid’s Corner each Wednesday at 10:00 a.m. Our next session is June 25 at the Warner Robins location, and the following week will be in Macon.

We will have snacks, drinks, and drawings for giveaways!

Stay tuned to our Facebook page for updates on these events.

Shop Local – Books & Food

Warner Robins, Byron, Perry, Macon… they each have a Gottwals Books store, and they each have a weekly or seasonal Farmers Market!

Our cookbook selection offers great ideas on making the most of your locally grown produce and fresh meats!

Genre of the Week

Anthologies

Reached the end of a series and stumped as to what to read next? Check out the anthology section at Gottwals!

Anthologies are a great way to find authors similar to your old favorites and a low-risk means of sampling books outside your comfort zone.

In addition to mass-market romance and mystery anthologies, you’ll often find unusual story collections you’d never thought to try!

Toy of the Week

Activity Pads: $4.97

Going on a long car or airplane ride to your summer vacation? Melissa and Doug® activity pads are perfect for hours of occupation and fun!
